select type.id AS id, type.finance_name AS financeName, type.show_order AS showOrder, type.is_public AS isPublic from tb_finance_type type LEFT JOIN tb_finance_department_to_type dtype ON dtype.finance_type_Id = type.id
type.record_status=1 and dtype.record_status=1
and dtype.department_id =#{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
or type.is_public=1
order by type.show_order

select dtype.id AS id, dtype.department_id AS departmentId, dtype.department_name AS departmentName, dtype.finance_type_Id AS financeTypeId from tb_finance_type type LEFT JOIN tb_finance_department_to_type dtype ON dtype.finance_type_Id = type.id
type.record_status=1 and dtype.record_status=1
and type.id =#{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and type.is_public=0
order by type.show_order
